title: Ride On Sweeper DRS-90T
description: The DRS-90T Ride On Sweeper is an all-in-one cleaning unit designed for use in industrial, commercial, or outdoor spaces. As a ride-on sweeper, it is comfortable to use and performs well while being easy to control. The DRS-90T features modern filtration and dust collection systems, which make it easy to operate. Its ability to remove dirt, dust, and debris with ease allows the DRS-90T to clean parking lots, warehouses, and factory floors.
keyFeatures: Enhanced Efficiency: The unit’s strong suction power and wide sweeping path allows it to clear large spaces within short periods of time.
Optimal Dust Control: Clean air and minimal dust return is ensured because of the multi-stage filtration system that features a powerful vacuum and filter shaker.
Easy Maintenance: Brush replacement does not require tools and important components are easy to access, which helps reduce service costs.
Increased Operating Time: The DRS-90T may be fitted with a battery system in addition to a fuel-efficient engine, providing extended runtime ideal for protracted shifts.
Simple Design: The ergonomic design of the user cabin enables perfect seating posture and comfortable operation. Clear controls and excellent visibility make it fatigue-free.
Sturdy Construction: The unit is ideal for tough working environments due to the body panels that are impact-resistant and the steel frame that is durable.
